title: Nat Geo Wolves A Legend Returns To Yellowstone 2007 RLG
description:
[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/11/11/WolvesALegendReturnstoYellowstoneDVD.jpg[/img]

This classic, beloved National Geographic special was four years in the making and this amazing film invites you to run with the pack for a wolf's-eye-view. Witness the unfolding saga of hardships and affection, losses and triumphs, and the controversy surrounding the decision to reintroduce wolves back into the heart of the West.

Bonus feature: wolves photo gallery.

[color=red][b]For Newer Users.
Simply Drag downloaded folder to your Media Player. This is a PAL DVD.
This is ripped so you would have best quality, menu, bonus/special feature, language options etc.
Note DVDs may not have have all* features.[/b][/color]
